location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 92 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '44'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View near Der-i-Kezineh [Darkhazīneh]. A horse-drawn carriage stands waiting at centre. Alongside it on the left runs the Tembi river (possibly a tributary of the Karun river). A scree-covered slope extends downwards towards the river from right.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: 'Tembi River 'Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘46’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘Near Der-i-Kezineh.’, ‘(April 1917)’
